title: SOLD: T206 SOVEREIGN 350 Christy Mathewson Dark Cap PSA 4.5
author: wilkiebaby11

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 SOVEREIGN 350 Christy Mathewson Dark Cap PSA 4.5
posts.post_content:
Pop 1, Only 1 graded higher.  **Note, there are some that have yet to be reassigned from 'Sovereign' to 'Sovereign 350' or '460', so this the pop reports are not completely accurate.
As of 10/8/18, VCP on a regular back will presumably be $1426, up from current $1391, based on 5 sales ranging from $1286-$1600.

Asking $1975 OBO
